#Apaxy Demo: adamwhitcroft.com/apaxy Apaxy is a customisable theme built to enhance the experience of browsing web directories. It uses the mod_autoindex Apache module—and some CSS—to override the default style of a directory listing. ##Features Apaxy may be basic, but it gives you a great deal of creative freedom when styling your directory. Style your directory listing with CSS. Make it pop with Javascript or jQuery. Add welcome messages, download instructions or copyright notices.
Apaxy by @adamwhitcroft // grab the 2nd child and add the parent class. tr:nth-child(2) document.getElementsByTagName('tr')[1].className = 'parent';
守望诗班赞美诗MP3、@守望网刊等资源下载页面——基督教北京守望教会 微信不支持下载，将尝试直接打开文件。如果你要下载，请点击微信右上角，然后在浏览器中打开哦。
